The Institute was established as Food Craft Institute in the year 2019. It was setup by the Department of Tourism, Govt. of Rajasthan and affiliated with the National Council for Hotel Management & Catering Technology, Noida, an apex body under the Ministry of Tourism, Govt. of India. It is situated in the heart of Sumperpur, having 8 Acre of sprawling campus, indoor & outdoor sports facilities. The Institute provides an adequate training facilities and other inputs to the students to help them to gain professional expertise. We look forward to a mutually beneficial association.
